summary:
Experienced Consultant across different industries and value chains. Experience in strategy and solving complex problems in the areas of emerging technology and development through creating innovation initiatives and programs, and supporting through implementation of partnerships and solutions across
multiple industries.
My interest is in the following practice areas of Consulting: Entrepreneurial and private clients, Sustainability, Strategy in industry Sectors like Transportation and New Mobility, Consumer Business, Technology, Venture Capital and New Ventures and Engineering.

projects.title: ECE 495 Senior Design Project
projects.description:
The customer wanted a robot to autonomously print a bitmap image onto a Fisher Price MagnaDoodle board. With an emphasis on speed and accuracy, the design must accurately convey the image with multiple shades of gray displaying on the board. It must print the image relatively fast while not being loud or dangerous and still be reliable. Additionally, it must use Matlab/Simulink and the xPC to complete closed loop control. The final design must cost less than $300 (not including the costs of the xPC, Q4 board, and the Techron Amplifier). The system must not use a prismatic design for printing images on the MagnaDoodle board.

Won IEEE Piedmont Section Design Award

profile_positions.title: Program Manager
Senior Associate - Urban Innovation and Transport

profile_positions.description:
As a part of the New Sustainable Mobility and Transportation team at WRI Ross Center for Sustainable Cities:
Working with Indian Metro Rail projects:
1) Chennai Metro Rail Limited (CMRL): Strategized and executed the 'Gender Inclusion in Mobility' accelerator to understand women commuter travel patterns in the city and assess last-mile connectivity options with women-centric mobility solutions from a safety and employment lens.
2) Hyderabad/Kochi/Mumbai/Pune Metro Rail Limited: As a part of the STAMP (Station Access and Mobility Program in collaboration with Toyota Mobility Foundation), envisioned to increase accessibility and multimodal integration through product-market fit for nascent to mature metro networks in India. Focus on data driven interventions in operations and design, AI solutions for crowd management and last-mile connectivity.
 
Represented WRI India as: 
1) the official assessor for Ashden Awards, an annual award competition that focuses on sustainable forms of transport.

2) the official assessor for Nasscom Industry Partnership Program (NIPP), a program designed to foster engagement between corporates and the startup ecosystem in India in Smart city sector.

3) as jury for Elevate 100, an initiative of the Department of Information Technology and Biotechnology, Government of Karnataka, intended to identify 100 innovative start-ups in Karnataka to scale up their product or solution.

Enabled partnership between WRI India and Maharashtra State Innovation Society (MSInS), the nodal agency for entrepreneurship for the Government of Maharashtra on fostering entrepreneurship in sectors of mobility, energy and urban development. Jury for solutions with the Maharashtra Government in the mobility sector.

Integral part of the Global Housing Technology Challenge with the Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs, Government of India, fostering the development of domestic technological research and eco-system of housing construction sector in the country.
profile_positions.title: Project Associate - Integrated Transport and Urban Innovation

profile_positions.description:
Deal Analysis and Investment
As part of the Investment team, evaluated various startups investment opportunities in different sectors such as FMCG, Disability Aids, Home Automation (IOT), and Architecture Tools amongst others.
o	Helped in due diligence of prospective startups on the platform
o	Prepared and led discussion papers and Investment Committee notes for prospective startups
o	Helped entrepreneurs create investor decks and 2-page summaries for investors
o	Prepared Term sheets and other financial documents for investee companies
o	Created presentations on startup trends and sector analysis using Traxcn and other tools.

Investor Relations
As a part of the Investor relations team, engaged in building relationships with existing and new investors. 
o	Created and led strategies to increase angel investors’ member-base on the platform via social media marketing on LinkedIn.
o	Responsible for leading startup opportunities for 100+ investors on the platform for investment
o	Helped market 1Crowd’s maiden fund (1Funds) to potential LPs. The fund would focus to deep technologies such as AI, ML, Life Sciences, and Healthcare amongst others.

Other
o	Led the marketing efforts to bring visibility for 1Crowd’s brand on social media.
o	Represented 1Crowd in several startups events as jury member at various conclaves such as IIT-K’s Startup Masterclass  & The Economic Times Power of Ideas.
o	Led and executed 1Crowd’s Inaugural Investor Meet that was attended by over 100 angel investors in Bangalore.

profile_positions.description:

company to reduce said risk in the following ways:

prototyping

into the orbit

launchboard, pre-accelerator and accelerator

roadmaps.

profile_positions.title: Investor Relations

profile_positions.description:
At the fund, I was responsible for looking into new sectors and industries for us to invest in. After the extensive coverage of the marketplace, I was responsible to do due diligence on some of the companies the fund was planning to invest in and compare them with their existing competitors. In addition, I had to help the companies in our existing portfolio and suggest them some strategies to make their model more appealing. My other tasks included attending conferences on behalf of the fund and talk to entrepreneurs looking for funding and evaluating their idea and business model and also attend meetings with the Fund Managers for the evaluation as well.

• Evaluation of investment scenario in start-ups in India.
• Investment Analysis of Investment opportunities at hand.
• Initiated various value creation projects for the portfolio company.
• Looked into the future and painting a scenario of businesses that can emerge and led by Indian entrepreneurs.
